entry.title: Operation: Beyond the Veil
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,207Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 0

Summary: World peace has finally arrived—and the Justice League is savoring every second. All except Bruce, whose sharp instincts sense the storm approaching while the rest of the world relaxs. He was right. When the Circle of the Black Blood resurges under the command of the vengeful Archmage Vikram Seth, a confrontation in Mumbai ends in tragedy: Bruce, Oliver, and Shayera are struck by an arcane curse that causes black rosebushes to sprout from their wounds, consuming them alive. With time running out and conventional magic failing, Clark is forced to break through Bruce's final barrier and reveal a secret not even the League knew: the existence of two interdimensionaly powerful mages living hidden right under everyone's noses… in Gotham. Now, the League's last hope rests with Bruce's most closely guarded friends—and the magical sanctuary they call home.

entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,193Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 371

Summary: Dick Grayson decided that the Young Justice crew and the Titans needed a proper official meting, no missions, no explosions, just hanging out as a big group of friends… with some alcohol. They end up playing never have I ever and seven minutes in haven. Wally and Dick end up just a little too close in the closet and they now have to figure out what this thing between them is. The fic is filled with character dynamics, fluff, smut, crack, angst and heartbreak! - and it is currently ongoing BUT i post pretty regularly (at least one chapter a week).

entry.title: Threshold
entry.summary:
Author: jhnycged

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,950Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 5

Summary: The flood has passed, but Gotham hasn’t healed — neither has Batman. Bruce thought he understood what darkness was, what justice meant, and where the line between the two lived. But then a piece of encrypted footage surfaces, something alien… something impossible. It’s not just about Metropolis anymore - it’s about the world. And the voice on that footage whispers a message that shakes him to his core: Superman wasn’t sent here to protect the people of earth. In the foreign city of Metropolis, Batman becomes a shadow again. But the closer he gets to the truth behind Superman, the more the lines begin to blur — between mission and obsession, between trust and weakness, between the man he is and the mask he can’t take off.

entry.summary:
Author: rosered27

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,273Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 22

Summary: "Please, Timmy.” Pulling him into his arms again, Tim didn’t protest it at all. “Just give us a chance to show you that we do, ‘kay? Please?” Tim sunk into Dick's hug. Sad, hurting, a part of him upset with his parents, and very hesitant. “...I dunno if I can.” “Then promise you’ll try? Can you do that?” “....Okay.” He whispered, breath stuttering. “...I’ll try.” or; Tim hasn't had anyone to rely on, and he'd never planned on that being the case... Maybe he should give it a try?

entry.title: best in show
entry.summary:
Author: butchyaoi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,823Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: “Clark,” Bruce starts, and then pauses for twenty—slightly faster than usual, Clark notes—heartbeats. Clark wets his lips, anticipation hot and fluttery in his gut as he waits for Bruce to continue. “Would you like to be a good boy? For me?” His answer is yes; he feels it immediately like a rush going through his body, from the rapidly-heating tips of his ears to where he rocks back on his heels, stunned backwards by the question. He needs to ask, though, even as embarrassment tinges his words. “As… ah, as your dog?” (Clark got transformed into a dog. After he gets turned back to normal, he and Bruce have some Normal Feelings about it.) Dog Clark for Superbat Freak Week 2025!
